overview: Fatima feels that she is the only one in this world. Dr. Ahmed loves her and marries her despite her past, and Samir gives birth to him. After a period of time, Abbas ends his sentence and searches for Fatima. She finds her address but she goes to his home. , And tries to assault her, in the police department calls her husband, and decides to divorce her and deprives her son and travels outside Egypt, and lives in a state of misery for years.
title: ضاع العمر يا ولدى
